page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: {Mowden Hall }was built in 1800 for the Joicey family.It was sold as a 1000 acre estate in the 1860s and was known as the{Newton Hall}Estate.The founder of the{school} Mr.Frank Marchbank,who died in 1985,bought the estate in 1945 and opened a{Prep}school.It was made into a charitable trust in the 1960s. It provides education for{116 children 8 of whom are daily attenders,and 13 of whom are girls.Many go on to Public schools both local and national.The school offers a wide range of subjects and several sports.It has an outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts as well as football,rugby and cricket pitches.There are many out of school activities for the children to enjoy,ranging from chess clubs to drama,from campfires to treasure hunts Parents are encouraged to play an active part in the school.
